revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt Silver |image = [[File:Mt Silver.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt Silver. |tokens = 10,000 |location = On the west end of Route 28. }} '''Mt Silver''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
== Dungeon Stats ==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 130,500 |- | Larvitar (Boss) || 440,000 |}
== Pokémon ==
The following pokémon can be found in this dungeon.
* Ponyta * Doduo * Tangela * Sneasel * Ursaring * Donphan * Teddiursa * Phanpy * Quagsire * Misdreavus * Larvitar (boss)
== Items ==
The following items can be obtained from opening chests in this dungeon.
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
